snippet: Seven American and three Afghan soldiers were killed on Thursday when their Black Hawk helicopter crashed in Kandahar Province.
abstract: Seven American soldiers, three Afghan soldiers and an interpreter are killed when their Black Hawk helicopter crashes in Kandahar Province in southern Afghanistan; spokesman for the Taliban claims group shot down plane, but American officials say it is not clear yet whether mechanical failure or enemy fire caused the crash.

byline.contributor: Jawad Sukhanyar and Sangar Rahimi contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Seven American and three Afghan soldiers were killed on Thursday when their Black Hawk helicopter crashed in Kandahar Province.

headline.seo: 11 Killed as U.S. Copter Goes Down in Afghanistan
headline.main: 11 Are Killed as U.S. Copter Goes Down in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: 11 Are Killed As U.S. Copter Goes Down In Afghanistan
